question_text: What role does DOCSIS play in a typical home internet setup using a cable modem?
answer_options: It encrypts all wireless traffic between router and modem
It defines the standard for Ethernet over coax
It governs how data is transmitted over cable TV lines
It converts fiber signals to analog DSL signals
correct_answer: It governs how data is transmitted over cable TV lines
explanation: DOCSIS (Data Over Cable Service Interface Specification) is a standard for data transmission over cable television infrastructure.
